adminProperties.name: Cost Manager
adminProperties.description: Cost Manager owns the Cost Program - manages the cost staff, assigns Cost Analysts specific Cost Accounts. Has authority to create BCRs and has final Approvals. Can do everything a Cost Analyst can do.

history.string: add role "Cost Manager" description "Cost Manager owns the Cost Program - manages the cost staff, assigns Cost Analysts specific Cost Accounts. Has authority to create BCRs and has final Approvals. Can do everything a Cost Analyst can do." parent "Global User" assign person "Test Everything" !hidden
